destination.name: Gyeongbokgung Palace
destination.description: A grand palace in Seoul, known for its beautiful architecture and historical significance.

destination.name: Jeju Island
destination.description: A picturesque island with volcanic landscapes, waterfalls, and unique geological formations.

destination.name: Bukhansan National Park
destination.description: A popular national park offering hiking trails and stunning views of Seoul.

destination.name: N Seoul Tower
destination.description: An iconic landmark providing panoramic views of Seoul from the top of Namsan Mountain.

destination.name: Changdeokgung Palace
destination.description: A UNESCO World Heritage site with beautiful gardens and well-preserved architecture.

destination.name: Busan's Gamcheon Culture Village
destination.description: A vibrant, colorful village known for its street art and unique atmosphere.

destination.name: Seoraksan National Park
destination.description: A stunning national park with diverse flora and fauna, waterfalls, and hiking trails.

destination.name: Jagalchi Fish Market
destination.description: Korea's largest seafood market, offering a lively atmosphere and a variety of fresh seafood.

destination.name: Everland Theme Park
destination.description: South Korea's largest theme park with thrilling rides, entertainment, and a zoo.

destination.name: Haeundae Beach
destination.description: Busan's most famous beach, popular for its golden sand and vibrant nightlife.

destination.name: Lotte World Tower
destination.description: The tallest building in South Korea, featuring an observation deck and shopping complex.

destination.name: Suwon Hwaseong Fortress
destination.description: A UNESCO World Heritage site, Suwon's fortress is renowned for its impressive walls and architecture.

destination.name: Boseong Green Tea Fields
destination.description: Endless green tea plantations offering a picturesque landscape in Boseong.

destination.name: Gwangalli Beach
destination.description: Another popular beach in Busan, known for its fine sand and the stunning Gwangan Bridge.

destination.name: Insa-dong
destination.description: A cultural and artistic district in Seoul, famous for its antique shops, art galleries, and traditional tea houses.

destination.name: Jeonju Hanok Village
destination.description: A preserved area with traditional Korean houses (hanoks), offering a glimpse into the country's history.

destination.name: Andong Hahoe Folk Village
destination.description: A UNESCO-listed village known for its traditional thatched-roof houses and cultural heritage.

destination.name: Dongdaemun Design Plaza
destination.description: An iconic landmark in Seoul, known for its innovative design and hosting fashion events.

destination.name: Seongsan Ilchulbong Peak
destination.description: A UNESCO World Heritage site, this volcanic peak offers breathtaking views and hiking opportunities.

destination.name: Jinhae Cherry Blossom Festival
destination.description: A spring festival held in Jinhae, famous for its stunning cherry blossoms.

destination.name: Lantern Festival
destination.description: An annual festival featuring thousands of lanterns, creating a magical atmosphere.

destination.name: Namsangol Hanok Village
destination.description: A hanok village in the heart of Seoul, showcasing traditional Korean architecture and culture.

destination.name: Seokguram Grotto
destination.description: A magnificent grotto housing a Buddha statue, carved into the granite mountainside.

destination.name: Boryeong Mud Festival
destination.description: A summer festival where visitors can enjoy mud-based activities and entertainment.

destination.name: Songnisan National Park
destination.description: A scenic national park known for its beautiful temples, waterfalls, and hiking trails.

destination.name: Gwanghwamun Square
destination.description: A historic public square in Seoul, featuring statues and monuments.

destination.name: Miryang Jirisan Hot Springs
destination.description: Relaxing hot springs surrounded by beautiful mountain scenery.

destination.name: Beomeosa Temple
destination.description: A historic Buddhist temple in Busan with beautiful architecture and serene surroundings.

destination.name: Seoul Kimchi Making & Hanbok Experience
destination.description: A cultural experience where visitors can make kimchi and try on traditional Korean clothing (hanbok).

destination.name: Yonggungsa Temple
destination.description: A seaside temple in Busan, offering stunning ocean views and unique architecture.

destination.name: Yangdong Folk Village
destination.description: A well-preserved traditional village showcasing the architectural heritage of the Joseon Dynasty.

destination.name: Korean Folk Village
destination.description: An open-air museum in Yongin, providing a glimpse into traditional Korean life and culture.

destination.name: Jamsil Baseball Stadium
destination.description: A popular stadium in Seoul where visitors can enjoy baseball games and the vibrant atmosphere.

destination.name: Gyeongju National Museum
destination.description: A museum in Gyeongju showcasing artifacts and relics from the region's rich history.

destination.name: Seopjikoji
destination.description: A scenic coastal area on Jeju Island with picturesque landscapes and charming walking paths.

destination.name: Daejeon Expo Park
destination.description: A large park in Daejeon, featuring beautiful gardens, sculptures, and exhibitions.

destination.name: Hwaseong Fortress
destination.description: A UNESCO World Heritage site in Suwon, known for its well-preserved fortress walls and architectural features.

destination.name: Daegu E-World
destination.description: A large amusement park in Daegu offering rides, shopping, and entertainment for visitors of all ages.

destination.name: Yeouido Hangang Park
destination.description: A riverside park in Seoul along the Han River, popular for picnics, biking, and scenic views of the city.

destination.name: Seoul Forest
destination.description: A vast public park in Seoul featuring deer, an insect garden, and beautiful walking trails.

destination.name: Gyeonghwa Station Cherry Blossom Road
destination.description: A stunning avenue in Jinhae, lined with cherry blossom trees, creating a breathtaking floral tunnel.

destination.name: Sejong Center for the Performing Arts
destination.description: A major cultural complex in Seoul, hosting a variety of performances, exhibitions, and events.

destination.name: Incheon Chinatown
destination.description: The largest Chinatown in South Korea, known for its vibrant atmosphere, delicious cuisine, and cultural events.
